item.title: 2. Conduction In Semiconductors, pn Junction
item.description:
Carrier Motion in Semiconductors

Drift Carriers move under Electric Field
Difussion Carriers move due to Carrier Gradient or Temperature Gradient
Recombination-generation

Drift

载流子在电场中移动情况

  1. 受力分析

$$ \begin{equation} \begin{aligned} F &= m_na = qE \\ m_n:& \ effective \ electron \ mass \\ \end{aligned} \end{equation} $$

  1. 加速度 和 速度

$$ \begin{align} \therefore a_p &= \frac{ qE }{ m_n } \\ a_n &= \frac{ -q E }{ m_n } \end{align} $$

$$ \begin{equation} \begin{aligned} \frac{ dv }{ dt } &= \frac{ qE }{ m } \\ v &= \int_{ }^{ } \frac{ q }{ m } dt E \\ v &= \mu E \end{aligned} \end{equation} $$

$\mu$ 不同物质、不同载流子的electron mobility不相同
$v_d$ Drift Velocity: 电子在电场中运动的平均速度

Drift Current Density

  • 单位时间穿过单位横截面的电荷量

$$ \begin{equation} \begin{aligned} J_D &= \frac{ (p + n) qv_d t A }{ t A } \\ &= (p+n) qv_d \\ &= ( \sigma_p + \sigma_n )E \end{aligned} \end{equation} $$

$$ \begin{align} J_{D,n} + J_{D,p} &= pq\mu_p E + nq\mu_n E \\ \therefore \sigma_p &= pq\mu_p, \sigma_n = pq\mu_n \\ \rho &= \frac{ 1 }{ pq \mu_q + nq\mu_n } \end{align} $$

Difussion

Gradient Relations

$$ \begin{align} \Gamma_n &= -D_n \frac{ dn }{ dx } \\ J_n &= q \Gamma_n \end{align} $$

$\Gamma$ Net Electron Flux
$D_n$ Difussion Coefficient

Einstein Relations

$$ \begin{align} \frac{ D_p }{ \mu_p } &= \frac{ D_n }{ \mu_n } = \frac{ k_B T }{ q } \end{align} $$

Current Density in Total

$$ \begin{align} J_n &= nq\mu_nE_x + q D_n \frac{ dn }{ dx } \\ J_q &= pq\mu_pE_x - q D_p \frac{ dp }{ dx } \\ \end{align} $$

Recombination-Generation

最简单的类型 Band-to-band Recombination

  1. 过程
  • $e^-$Diffusion $\Longrightarrow$ 从CB跃迁到VB
  1. 结果
  • 在GaA、InP等物质中产生photon，在Si、Ge等物质中产生heat
  1. Diffusion Length

$$ \begin{align} L_p &= \sqrt{ D_p \tau_p } \\ L_n &= \sqrt{ D_n \tau_n } \end{align} $$

  • $\tau_p$: electron recombination lifetime

pn Junction

定义

An Interface/ Boundary between 2 Semiconductor material types.

结构

Metallurgical Junction

  1. depletion region (Space charge layer) 就在M Junction两侧

  2. 相关的电场形成，促使Carrier返回原处

  1. 两股力量抵消，直至equilibrium

  2. Depletion widths

$$ \begin{align} N_a W_p &= N_d W_n \end{align} $$

各种重要公式

$$ \begin{align} V_0 &= \frac{ kT }{ e } ln \Big(\frac{ N_a N_d }{ n_i^2 }\Big) \\ W_0 &= \Big[ \frac{ 2 \varepsilon (N_a + N_d) V_0 }{ e N_a N_d } \Big]^{1/2} \\ W_0 &= \Big[ \frac{ 2 \varepsilon V_0 }{ e N_d } \Big]^{1/2} ( N_a \gg N_d ) \end{align} $$
